question: "Debundscha", one of the five rainiest places in the world, is located in which nation?
explanation: Debundscha is located in Cameroon. It is located at the foothills of Mount Cameroon facing the Atlantic Ocean. It is one of the five rainiest places in the world in which others are Lloro(Colombia), Mawsynram(India), the Big Bog(Hawaiian Islands) and Cherrapunji(India). It is located in equator giving it a year-round hot and humid climate.
